subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Sammy Sosa says he expects to play again in 2008. He would like it to be with the Texas Rangers, even though he has been only a part-time player since the beginning of August.
snippet: Sammy Sosa says he expects to play again in 2008. He would like it to be with the Texas Rangers, even though he has been only a part-time player since the beginning of August.
